notes: Employer deducts TDS based on income tax slab (new or old regime). Monthly TDS = estimated annual tax / 12.
Applicable if PF withdrawal before 5 years of service and amount > threshold
Interest on debentures, government securities (not tax-free bonds)
Dividend from domestic companies
Bank/FD interest. Threshold 50000 for senior citizens. Banking/co-op threshold is 40000.
Flat 30% without any deduction
Flat 30% without any deduction
1% for individual/HUF contractors, 2% for others. Single payment >30K or aggregate >1L in FY.
Commission/remuneration to insurance agents
On income component of maturity proceeds exceeding threshold
No threshold. Payment to NR sportsperson or entertainer
Commission/remuneration on sale of lottery tickets
Any commission or brokerage (not insurance). Threshold per FY.
2% for plant/machinery/equipment, 10% for land/building/furniture. Annual threshold 2.4L.
1% on consideration for transfer. Threshold is property value > 50 lakhs.

description: Rent by individual/HUF (not liable to audit)
notes: Monthly rent exceeding 50000. Deducted by individual/HUF tenant.
10% for professional services, 2% for technical services / royalty / call center. Threshold per FY.
On income distributed by mutual funds to unit holders

description: Compensation on acquisition of immovable property
notes: Compulsory acquisition by government. Enhanced compensation.
Individuals/HUF not liable to audit. Commission, brokerage, contract payment. Aggregate threshold 50L.
2% on cash withdrawal exceeding 1 crore. 5% if no ITR filed for 3 years (threshold 20L).
E-commerce operator to deduct 1% on gross amount paid to e-commerce participant
Bank deducts TDS for senior citizens (75+) having only pension + interest income from same bank
0.1% on purchase value exceeding 50 lakhs from a resident seller. Buyer's turnover must exceed 10 Cr.
10% on benefits/perquisites arising from business or profession. Threshold 20000 per FY.
1% on transfer of VDA. Threshold 10000 (50000 for specified persons).
Rate depends on nature of payment and DTAA provisions. No threshold.
TCS (not TDS). Seller collects 0.1% on sale exceeding 50 lakhs. Seller's turnover must exceed 10 Cr.
Section 206C(1H). 0.1% TCS on sale consideration exceeding 50 lakhs.
5% on remittance under LRS exceeding 7 lakhs. 20% for non-education/medical purposes above threshold.
5% on overseas tour package (any amount). 20% if amount exceeds 7 lakhs.
